# Initial setup

```{r results='hide', message=FALSE}
rm(list=ls())
setwd("~/GitHub/coevolution-ts/")
require("dplyr")
```

# Load data and standardize trait data (percent sporulation)

```{r}
data <- read.csv("./data/sporulation-growth.csv", header = TRUE, sep =",")
perc.spore.std <- scale(data$perc.spore)
data <-data.frame(data, perc.spore.std)
```

# Select strains

```{r}
# Wild type host without seed bank and no phage
wt.np.anc <- filter(data, host == "WT" & phage == "no_Phage" & line == "ANC") %>%
   dplyr::select(colony, perc.spore.std, growth.rate) %>%
   group_by(colony) %>%
   summarize(perc.spore.std = mean(perc.spore.std), growth.rate = mean(growth.rate)) 

# Wild type host without seed bank and SP01
wt.np.short <- filter(data, host == "WT" & phage == "no_Phage" & seed.bank == "short") %>%
   dplyr::select(colony, perc.spore.std, growth.rate) %>%
   group_by(colony) %>%
   summarize(perc.spore.std = mean(perc.spore.std), growth.rate = mean(growth.rate)) 
```

# Plot selection gradient

```{r}
png(filename="~/GitHub/coevolution-ts/plots/select.grad.wt.png",
    width = 1200, height = 1200, res = 96*2)

plot.new()
par(mar = c(7, 7, 5, 7))

plot(wt.np.anc$perc.spore.std, wt.np.anc$growth.rate, xlim = c(-0.1, 1.1), 
     ylim = c(0.019, 0.051), type = "p", 
     pch = 21, bg = "pink", col = "black", cex = 1.5, ylab = "", xlab = "", 
     cex.lab = 1.5, las = 1, lwd = 1, yaxt = "n", xaxt = "n")
box(lwd=2)

# Add ticks and tick labels
axis(side = 2, lwd.ticks = 2, las = 1, cex.axis = 1.25, 
   labels = c("0.02", "0.03", "0.04", "0.05"), at = c(0.02, 0.03, 0.04, 0.05))

axis(side = 4, labels = F, lwd.ticks = 2, 
   at = c(0.02, 0.03, 0.04, 0.05))

axis(side = 1, lwd.ticks = 2, cex.axis = 1.25, las = 1,
    labels = c("0.0", "0.25", "0.50", "0.75", "1.0"), at = c(0, 0.25, 0.5, 0.75, 1))

axis(side = 3, labels = F, lwd.ticks = 2, las = 1, cex.axis = 1.25, 
   at = c(0, 0.25, 0.5, 0.75, 1))

mtext('Standardized percent sporulation', side = 1, outer = TRUE, cex = 1.5, 
      line = -4, adj = 0.5)

mtext('Growth rate', side = 2, outer = TRUE, cex = 1.5, line = -3.5, adj = 0.6)

fit1 <- lm(wt.np.anc$growth.rate ~ wt.np.anc$perc.spore.std)
abline(fit1, col = "red", lty = 2, lwd = 2)

points(wt.np.short$perc.spore.std, wt.np.short$growth.rate, type = "p", 
     pch = 21, bg = "lightblue", lwd = 1, col = "black", cex = 1.5)

fit2 <- lm(wt.np.short$growth.rate ~ wt.np.short$perc.spore.std)
abline(fit2, col = "blue", lty = 2, lwd = 2)
```
